name: Block Blast 3D Free
description:
★★★★★ "My son will play this for hours if I let him!"
★★★★★ "VERY ADDICTIVE!"

DESCRIPTION:
This app will entertain you and your kids for days! Use up to 10 fingers at a time to build great block structures then blow them apart while a beautiful musical score plays in the background. These are the most realistic and customizable blocks on the app store. You can turn gravity off and see how blocks act in space or make them the extremely bouncy and then try to build large towers.

FEATURES:
√ Realistic physics in a 3D environment
√ Adjustable gravity
√ Adjustable bounciness
√ Adjustable block size
√ 4 classical and modern background songs to choose from
